thread.title: Well, This Was the World's Easiest Chart to Make
thread.title_full: Well, This Was the World's Easiest Chart to Make

author: Kevin Drum
title: Well, This Was the World's Easiest Chart to Make

organizations.name: world's easiest chart to make kevin drum mar.

text:
Well, This Was the World's Easiest Chart to Make Kevin Drum Mar. 21, 2017 2:55 PM Email 
CBPP has calculated how much tax money you'll save if Obamacare is repealed. Behold: 
You know what really gets me? Even among the millionaires, repeal will only earn them about $50,000. That's like finding spare change in the sofa cushions for this crowd. Is clawing back a few nickels and dimes really worth immiserating 20 million people? Get the scoop, straight from Mother Jones. Looking for news you can trust? Subscribe to our free newsletters.
